name: Fightly.ai
description: The AI-Powered Cybersecurity & Computer Network Fist Ai project on SKALE Bockchain Fightly AI unites artificial intelligence with a global distributed computing network, giving you the power to: Protect systems with real-time, self-learning AI defenses Rent CPU power worldwide or monetize your idle machines Deploy AI models securely, without limits Why Fightly AI? AI-Driven Cybersecurity – Real-time threat detection, adaptive defenses, and a self-learning security layer. Global Peer-to-Peer CPU Network – Tap into worldwide compute capacity or share your unused cycles for rewards. Cost-Efficient Power – Access high-performance computing & AI training at a fraction of traditional costs. Eco-Friendly Compute – Reduce waste, extend hardware lifespan, and contribute to greener computing. Core Features & Utilities Rent or lend CPU power instantly Deploy AI models with built-in security layers Earn from idle machines while defending the network
